The set of all possible combinations of colours in holes

G

Generates a list of all possible combinations of black and white pegs
generateAllPossibilities(int, int) - Static method in class Mastermind
Generates all the possible ways of organising a given number of colours into a given number of holes
getAllPossibilities() - Method in class Mastermind
Getter for the list of all possible combinations of colours
getMinMaxedGuess() - Method in class Mastermind
Makes an informed choice about which guess to make next by using minimax technique Partially based on the C# implementation in http://stackoverflow.com/a/20418736
getRandomGuess() - Method in class Mastermind
Makes a guess by choosing the first item from the hashset that's available
guess() - Method in class Mastermind
Makes the next guess, returns true if we have found the guess that we were looking for

H

reset() - Method in class Mastermind
Resets the main parts of the program back to it's initial state
runGameSims(int, int, int, Strategy) - Static method in class MastermindTest
Run the game simulation set a given number of times for each strategy Example: If we have 4 holes, 6 colours at 100 runs a total of 6^4 * 100 = 129600 games would be run
runGameSims(int, Strategy) - Static method in class MastermindTest
Default version of runGameSims for 6 colours and 4 holes
